casebody.data:
TARRANT
v.
FREEWAY FOODS, et al. No. 219P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2004. John W. Ormand, III, Charles E. Coble, Raleigh, for Freeway Foods. Faith Herndon, for Tarrant. John W. Gresham, Charlotte, for Academy of Trial Lawyers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of June 2004 by Capital Associated Industries, Inc. Piedmont Associated Industries, Inc., The Employer's Association, Inc. and Western Carolina Industries, Inc. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of June 2004."
